page.title: 16A Family Weekend
page.content: My family usually gets up at 8.00a.m Mum goes to Nanny's and they go shopping.Sandra goes straight to work and Clare and I go and watch T.V. Sometimes dad goes to work but if he doesn't he does jobs around the house. My mum,nanny and myself usually go to Hemel or Watford or go to my aunties. When we return we have tea,sit down and watch T.V.and then go to bed. On Sunday we get up at 7.00 .We have our breakfast and then get ready for Church.We go to church as a family. Then we come home for dinner and in the afternoon we go and visit relatives.We usually go for a walk along the Canal with their dog and then come back and have tea.We then drive home for me to go to bed at 9.00p.m.
